abstract: General Electric raised $12.2 billion by selling 547.8 million shares for 9.2 percent less than Wednesday’s closing price, giving it more cash to finance operations.
lead_paragraph: General Electric raised $12.2 billion by selling 547.8 million shares for 9.2 percent less than Wednesday’s closing price, giving it more cash to finance operations.

headline.main: G.E. Raises $12.2 Billion by Selling New Stock
